definition: A prominent or outstanding feature, event, or moment that is typically associated with positive attention or excitement. It is often used to describe a particularly memorable or noteworthy aspect of a performance, presentation, or experience.

examples.german: Das Konzert war das Highlight des Jahres.
examples.english: The concert was the highlight of the year.

examples.german: Der Urlaub in Italien war ein Highlight für mich.
examples.english: The vacation in Italy was a highlight for me.

examples.german: Das Feuerwerk war das Highlight der Veranstaltung.
examples.english: The fireworks were the highlight of the event.

examples.german: Der Höhepunkt des Films war definitiv das Highlight.
examples.english: The climax of the movie was definitely the highlight.

examples.german: Das neue Restaurant ist ein kulinarisches Highlight.
examples.english: The new restaurant is a culinary highlight.
